fields.label: core.images.index
fields.text: Rider tapping a debit card to pay for their trip

fields.label: core.pages.index.content_title
fields.text: The new way to pay for transit makes it easier to get your discount every time you ride

fields.label: core.pages.index.p1
fields.text: With new contactless payment options, you can tap your bank-issued credit or debit card when you board, and your discount will automatically apply.

fields.label: core.pages.index.p2
fields.text: We don’t save any of your information, and you don’t need to create an account!

fields.label: core.pages.index.p3
fields.text: Verify your discount, and connect your bank card today.

fields.label: eligibility.pages.index.content_title
fields.text: Great, you’ll need two things before we get started...

fields.label: eligibility.pages.index.p1
fields.text: This program is currently open to those who are 65 or older. Not over 65? Get in touch with your transit provider to learn about other available discount programs.
